text:
Graph and order these numbers from least to greatest

\begin{array}{l}\n\text { A. } 1331 \\\n\text { Graph from least to greatest } \\\n\sqrt{9}, 4,-\frac{2}{3},-2.1 \\\n-\quad<\quad \longrightarrow \quad+ \\\n<\frac{1}{-3}-2 \quad-1 \quad 0, \quad+\frac{1}{2}, 2 \quad 3\n\end{array}[imath]\text { A. } 1331 [/imath] [imath]\text { Graph from least to greatest } [/imath] [imath]\sqrt{9}, 4,-\frac{2}{3},-2.1 [/imath] [imath]-\quad<\quad \longrightarrow \quad+ [/imath] [imath]<\frac{1}{-3}-2 \quad-1 \quad 0, \quad+\frac{1}{2}, 2 \quad 3[/imath]
